mdRecord.dcterms:description: Lee, having tendered his resignation to Jefferson Davis in a letter written on August 22, 1863, in the wake of the Gettysburg Campaign, responds to Davis's declination of the offer.
There is a JPG image which was created from a scan of the original item but it is of poor quality. There is also a transcription.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Davis, Jefferson, 1808-1889
